text.div:
Arboviral Disease [Other] (Tests for Arbovirus [Other] IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    13293-6 Colorado tick fever virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum

    8051-5 Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
